Writting your entitiesÂ¶

The task of defining entities is pretty simple as well and you won’t find trouble to accomplish. PyEnty accepts anything which inherits from its base class - Entity

Example:

class Profile(Entity):
    name = Str()

    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name
